name: Astral Destiny - Demo
description:
Astral Destiny Demo version 1.0

https://youtu.be/mAfL2-8OOZg

Astral Destiny is a sci-fi Adventure/Action game.
Made with Unity 5 free version.

Earth 2020. The "S.T.A.R." (Space and Time Anomalie Researcher), detected something on the Moon...
Something powerfull. We need to investigate it...
We weren't prepared for that...
Epic history.
Envolve yourself with your believes in this Action/Adventure to discover what is behind this anomalie...

WSAD - Move R- Return to Game after Dialog/ Reload Weapon

Space - Jump Mouse - Camera F- Interact
